text: Nestor José Forster Júnior (born 10 April 1963) is a Brazilian diplomat. He was nominated by President Jair Bolsonaro as the Brazilian Ambassador to the United States in 2019 and presented his diplomatic credentials to the United States government in December 2020. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Ambassadors to the United States Category:Brazilian diplomats Category:People from Porto Alegre
title: Nestor Forster
